verse:
तं दुर्दर्शं गूढमनुप्रविष्टं गुहाहितं गह्वरेष्ठं पुराणम्‌।
अध्यात्मयोगाधिगमेन देवं मत्वा धीरो हर्षशोकौ जहाति ॥

terms.गुहाहितं: in the cave of the heart
terms.अध्यात्मयोगाधिगमेन: through the practice of the yoga of self-realization
terms.This verse praises the Supreme Being who: realization, the wise recognize and attain the divine. As a result, they transcend the duality of joy and sorrow, becoming equipoised in all situations.

upanishad-org.meaning: Realising the God by attainment to Him through spiritual Yoga, even the Ancient of Days who hath entered deep into that which is hidden and is hard to see, for he is established in our secret being and lodged in the cavern heart of things, the wise and steadfast man casts away from him joy and sorrow.[p.110]
